backend/main.mo: Actor imports a migration module and mixes in blob storage functionality, exposing storage operations as the backend.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a no-op migration that simply returns the current actor unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for the Valentine app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and responsibilities of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility setup defining the app’s full OKLCH color palette and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing global Valentine content state, remote/local persistence, URL-based restore, and page navigation.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Renders decorative floating heart elements with varying sizes, positions, and animation delays.
frontend/src/components/SaveProgressButt: Save button with status indicators, upload progress, and a shareable-link popover including copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and updates the backend canister actor based on II identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, floating heart animations, and themed background utilities.
frontend/src/lib/saveId.ts: Helpers for reading, writing, and removing saveId query params and building shareable links.
frontend/src/lib/valentineProgressStorag: Manages saving and loading Valentine's progress using localStorage for text and IndexedDB for video blobs.
frontend/src/lib/valentineRemoteProgress: Implements remote snapshot handling, video upload validation, and conversion for backend sync of Valentine's progress.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/FinalMessagePage.tsx: UI page for editing and displaying the final Valentine's message with decorative heart animations.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page allowing users to enter a custom message and proceed, with animated hearts and styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: React component rendering three editable video slots with title inputs, upload handling, and a styled romantic layout with navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for a themed, responsive UI.
project_state.json: Project state file describing requirements, features, architecture notes, and current versioning for the Valentine’s website.
